think_action.Thought: The user wants to uninstall the 'Lyft' app, but the app is not visible on the current screen. I'll need to navigate through the 'All apps' section or search for the app to proceed with uninstallation.
Future Action Plan: Search for 'Lyft' using the search bar at the top of the screen.
If the app appears in the search results, tap on it to access the app options.
